shortDescription: I've received the coordinates for the rendezvous point from Lady Cunningham, Commander… we should be ready to roll when you are. I haven't managed to get Lady Cunningham herself on the horn—some kind of atmospheric interference is scrambling our long-range comms. But it should be pretty straightforward, all things said.
longDescription: The sooner we get these people to the rendezvous point, the sooner we can go home. Let's get a move on, {COMMANDER.FirstName}.

contractObjectiveList.title: Escort the Prison Transport to Lady Cunningham's DropShip
contractObjectiveList.description: Capture Convoy Rally Point, Escort Convoy to Safety, and Extract Safely

objectiveList.title: Eliminate the Hostile Bandits
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy the force of enemies which will try adn stop the player from reaching the rally point.

objectiveList.title: Destroy the Bandit Reinforcements
objectiveList.description: The objective to destroy enemy units which will attempt to block the convoy from reaching its destination.

objectiveList.title: Escort Hadley's Transport to the DropShip LZ
objectiveList.description: Escort Friendly units to their Destination

objectiveList.title: Ensure That All Prison Transport Vehicles Survive
objectiveList.description: Protect the all units in Convoy during Extraction, suffering no losses.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy hunter lance for mission complete.

objectiveList.title: Proceed to the Evac Zone
objectiveList.description: The objective to escape with all the player units.

objectiveList.title: Protect the Prison Convoy Until the DropShip Arrives
Protect the Prison Convoy As It Boards the DropShip

dialogueContent.words: All right, Commander, we're all patched up and ready to roll.
We're rolling through the repair bay's subterranean tunnel system now. I've marked our exit point on your screen; you'll want to meet us there.
Get us where we're going, and we'll see to it that Hadley is smoothly transferred into House Davion's custody.
Thanks for your help, Commander; Hadley has been packed onto the DropShip, and she's ready to fly. Best of luck in your future endeavors.
Pack it in, Commander. Nothing left to do here.
Commander. The enemy had deployed reinforcements and they are inbound. Expect increased resistance.
I've got more bad guys on radar, Commander. Keep 'em off of me, yeah?
You've reached the extraction point for the objective vehicles. Hold there are keep them safe until we can get them out.
Glad you could make it, friends. With your help, we're gonna get Hadley into Hanse Davion's hands and out of our hair forever.
Sounds like a plan. Our lance will keep them off of you while you move on the pickup point.
And they are away! The convoy is safely out of the AO. Good work, Commander. Now get your remaining forces to the second evac zone for extraction there.
